title: vireo
description: Vireo is primarily designed for demultiplexing cells into donors by modelling of expressed alleles.

Dataset input.title: Dataset input
Dataset input.description: Dataset input using nf-tower "dataset" or "data explorer". Allows for the input of multiple         parameter sets to initialise a Nextflow channel.

param_list.description: Dataset input can either be a list of maps, a csv file, a json file, a yaml file, or simply a yaml                 blob. The names of the input fields (e.g. csv columns, json keys) need to be an exact match with the workflow input parameters.

cell_data.description: Type: `file`. The cell genotype file in VCF format or cellSNP folder with sparse matrices
cell_data.help_text: Type: `file`. The cell genotype file in VCF format or cellSNP folder with sparse matrices.

n_donor.description: Type: `integer`, default: `2`. Number of donors to demultiplex; can be larger than provided in donor_file
n_donor.help_text: Type: `integer`, default: `2`. Number of donors to demultiplex; can be larger than provided in donor_file.

vartrix_data.description: Type: `file`. The cell genotype files in vartrix outputs
vartrix_data.help_text: Type: `file`. The cell genotype files in vartrix outputs.

donor_file.description: Type: `file`. The donor genotype file in VCF format
donor_file.help_text: Type: `file`. The donor genotype file in VCF format. Please filter the sample and region with bcftools first!

geno_tag.description: Type: `string`, default: `PL`, choices: ``GT`, `GP`, `PL``. The tag for donor genotype
geno_tag.help_text: Type: `string`, default: `PL`, choices: ``GT`, `GP`, `PL``. The tag for donor genotype.

no_doublet.description: Type: `boolean`, default: `false`. If use, not checking doublets
no_doublet.help_text: Type: `boolean`, default: `false`. If use, not checking doublets.

n_init.description: Type: `integer`, default: `50`. Number of random initializations, when GT needs to learn
n_init.help_text: Type: `integer`, default: `50`. Number of random initializations, when GT needs to learn.

extra_donor.description: Type: `integer`, default: `0`. Number of extra donor in pre-cluster, when GT needs to learn
extra_donor.help_text: Type: `integer`, default: `0`. Number of extra donor in pre-cluster, when GT needs to learn.

extra_donorMode.description: Type: `string`. Method for searching from extra donors
extra_donorMode.help_text: Type: `string`. Method for searching from extra donors. size: n_cell per donor; distance: GT distance between donors

force_learn_gt.description: Type: `boolean`, default: `false`. If use, treat donor GT as prior only
force_learn_gt.help_text: Type: `boolean`, default: `false`. If use, treat donor GT as prior only.

ase_mode.description: Type: `boolean`, default: `false`. If use, turn on SNP specific allelic ratio
ase_mode.help_text: Type: `boolean`, default: `false`. If use, turn on SNP specific allelic ratio.

no_plot.description: Type: `boolean`, default: `false`. If use, turn off plotting GT distance
no_plot.help_text: Type: `boolean`, default: `false`. If use, turn off plotting GT distance.

cell_range.description: Type: `string`. Range of cells to process
cell_range.help_text: Type: `string`. Range of cells to process.

call_ambient_rnas.description: Type: `boolean`, default: `false`. If use, detect ambient RNAs in each cell
call_ambient_rnas.help_text: Type: `boolean`, default: `false`. If use, detect ambient RNAs in each cell.

nextflow input-output arguments.title: Nextflow input-output arguments
nextflow input-output arguments.description: Input/output parameters for Nextflow itself. Please note that both publishDir and publish_dir are supported but at least one has to be configured.

publish_dir.description: Type: `string`, required, example: `output/`. Path to an output directory
publish_dir.help_text: Type: `string`, required, example: `output/`. Path to an output directory.
